channel.title: Elm Town
channel.description: A podcast about the people making and using the Elm language, and the things that they do.
channel.itunes:author: Murphy Randle
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast about the people making and using the Elm language, and the things that they do.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast about the people making and using the Elm language, and the things that they do..

item.title: Elm Town 27 - Murphy Randle's Story
item.description: Surprise! Mario Rogic is your host for this episode, because he's interviewing the normal host of the podcast, Murphy Randle.
item.content:encoded:
Surprise! Mario Rogic is your host for this episode, because he's interviewing the normal host of the podcast, Murphy Randle. Listen to hear about Murphy's background in Animation, and how Murphy came to the world of Web development, and eventually started Elm Town!

Links

  • (00:25:50) Climbing Into Elm

Picks

  • (00:39:15) Scalyr
  • (00:40:19) Our Patreon
  • (00:40:37) Reason Town
item.author: murphyrandle@gmail.com (Murphy Randle)
item.itunes:author: Murphy Randle
item.itunes:summary: Surprise! Mario Rogic is your host for this episode, because he's interviewing the normal host of the podcast, Murphy Randle.
item.itunes:subtitle: Surprise! Mario Rogic is your host for this episode, because he's interviewing the normal host of the podcast, Murphy Randle.
item.itunes:keywords: murphy, murphy randle, mario, mario rogic, elm town, animation, pixar

item.title: Elm Town 25 - The Evolution of an API, Part 2, with Richard Feldman
item.description: Richard tells Murphy all about how the API for elm-css has grown and drastically changed over the years.
item.content:encoded:
This is an extra long episode, so get ready!

  • (00:03:42) elm in action

  • (00:52:09) blog post about performant css and animations by Oleg Slobodskoi
  • (01:09:39) style-elements
item.author: murphyrandle@gmail.com (Murphy Randle)
item.itunes:author: Murphy Randle
item.itunes:summary: Richard tells Murphy all about how the API for elm-css has grown and drastically changed over the years.
item.itunes:subtitle: Richard tells Murphy all about how the API for elm-css has grown and drastically changed over the years.

item.title: Elm Town 15 - Preroll and Correction
item.content:encoded: Hi, everyone! Elm Town 15 will be released in a few minutes. I wanted to apologize for the accidentally horrid sound quality on my microphone, and to let you know that the coupon code for Daily Drip is now "elmtown-2017". Enjoy!
item.author: murphyrandle@gmail.com (Murphy Randle)

  • Big thanks to Egghead.io for sharing their Elm logo with us.
  • And big thanks to Day One for making this podcast possible.
